item.title: Just Meowied!
item.description: Today I have great news: I married my best friend and the love of my life, Mr. Clayton White! I’m so thrilled to begin our journey together and share every moment in our lives: the sweet love story from our past time together, the commitment on this very special day, and a lifetime of happiness in the future. We will always support each other as friends, love each other as family, and loyal to each other as lovers.
